name: Super Dogfight Duel
description:
Super Dogfight Duel is a local multiplayer air-to-air combat game, based around the fantastic mechanics of Vlambeer's Luftrausers.

SDD puts you in the skies against your friends for fast-paced, arcade action!

While the game is in development, feel free to pay what you want. The project isn't quite worth paying for yet but we'd love to get feedback on the game as we make it.

Anything you do pay will certainly help the development of this game and our other ongoing projects.

Thank you!

Controls:Player 1:
  • W- Accelerate
  • S/D- Turn
  • Space- Fire
Player 2:
  • Up arrow- Accelerate
  • Left/Right arrows- Turn
  • Enter (numpad recommended)- Fire

These are not the final controls- don't panic.

Gamepad:

The will automatically detect your gamepad and change the control scheme for you. If you plug in one gamepad, player one will use the gamepad. Pluggin in a second will allow player two to also use a gamepad- a better way of doing this is in progress.

(PS. Gamepad support has not been tested and is in early development)

The following controls are based on an Xbox gamepad.

  • A button- Accelerate
  • Left stick- Turn
  • Right trigger- Fire

Change log

0.1.0.0 - First alpha release

0.2.0.0:

  • [CHANGE] Some slight changes to background colours.
  • [FIX] Fixed the stretching wing bug
  • [NEW] Added some sounds to the game. Still no music.
  • [NEW] Added a single player mode.
  • [NEW] Added humorous speech to AI in singleplayer
